sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"devops-essentials"}}>{`DevOps-Essentials`}</MDXTag>
{/* TOC */}
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#devops-essentials"}}>{`DevOps-Essentials`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#10-traditional-responsibility-silos"}}>{`1.0 Traditional Responsibility Silos`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#terminology"}}>{`Terminology`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#20-iaas---infrastructure-as-a-service"}}>{`2.0: IaaS - Infrastructure as a Service`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#21-paas---platform-as-a-service"}}>{`2.1: PaaS - Platform as a Service`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#22-saas---software-as-a-service"}}>{`2.2: SaaS - Software as a Service`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#30-build-automation"}}>{`3.0: Build Automation`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#31-ci-and-cd"}}>{`3.1: CI and CD`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#40-jenkins"}}>{`4.0: Jenkins`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
{/* /TOC */}
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`What is DevOps?`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A software development method that stresses communication, collaboration, integration, automation and a measurement of cooperation between software devs and other IT professionals.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It acknowledges the interdependence of software dev, quality assure and IT operations.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You'll hear things like CI, build automation and treating the infrastructure like code.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It addresses short comings and obstacles that we come across in our careers.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"10-traditional-responsibility-silos"}}>{`1.0 Traditional Responsibility Silos`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`IT Operations are usually broken into the following:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Infrastructure and Monitoring`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Architecture and Planning`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Maintenence`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Support`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is the traditional operations stack.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`IT Dev is broken down into methodologies like the following:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Prototyping`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Waterfall`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Agile`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Rapid`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Hardware and networking were not necessarily well understood by skilled software developers and vice versa.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"terminology"}}>{`Terminology`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"20-iaas---infrastructure-as-a-service"}}>{`2.0: IaaS - Infrastructure as a Service`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Setting up a service for using IT Infrastructure`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`"Stack" involved includes things from hardware to the operating system and applications that sit on top.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Virtualisation is almost indistinguishable in speed when compared to standard infrastructure is`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"21-paas---platform-as-a-service"}}>{`2.1: PaaS - Platform as a Service`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Further down the rabbit hole! Next step in the redefinition of IT was looking at how the platform was provided.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This delivers a "computer platform" for consumption. It generally includes all of IaaS + a few additions.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In addition to before, this also addings in `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`runtime`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`middleware`}</MDXTag>{`. Services like `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Azure`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`App Engine`}</MDXTag>{` were some of the first to offer the underlying computer and storage resources that could scale automatically to match application demand so manual allocation of resources was no longer necessary.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It converged developer and operations skillsets even more.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"22-saas---software-as-a-service"}}>{`2.2: SaaS - Software as a Service`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Skills needed in this area has completely converged.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It is an important driving force behind DevOps. A ton of autoscaling code was written to deal with this.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Here, we need traditional software AND hardware personnel that need the same skills to operate within this space.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"30-build-automation"}}>{`3.0: Build Automation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Historically, this referred to software development. The process of "building" or compiling software that can then be deployed via script or cron jobs to various environments, including production systems.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It is about minimizing the deployment without manual intervention.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Generally the entire stack will look like the flow from top to bottom:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{}}>{`Dev Environment
|
Source Repo
|
Build Server
|
Integration Server
|
Test Server
|
Production Server
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It includes automated testing and rollback capabilities. This build is consistent and can reduce the troubleshooting when there are problems as a result.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"31-ci-and-cd"}}>{`3.1: CI and CD`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`CI means the practise of mergine dev working copies with the shared source main branch multiple times per day.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`CD is an approach where valuable software is produced in small delivery cycles and ensures that those features can be reliably and consistenly released at any point in time.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`CI has more to do with how the software code is managed throughout the development lifecycle, whereas CD is how valuable and how quickly that software can be released when it is determined that the aggregate features are valuable enough.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Although related, they are different in what they accomplish.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`DevOps uses each one and in term feeds the other in the chain.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"40-jenkins"}}>{`4.0: Jenkins`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Jenkins is build automation on steroids. It can be considered a CI but often considered a CD tool as well.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Used normally for build deployments, but can do anything from deploying scripts to launching virtual machines through VMWare or Vagrant to Docker.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It helps create a basic build job to the custom direction of containers with unit testing etc.`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
